article.title: Status and history for prq
article.para: This version is not a literal translation. Many subarticles are combined.

history.history-entry: The [prq] translation is a duplicate of the [cbs] translation and is retired. Thanks to Ivan Derzhanski for the report.
stage 4: Unicode version provided by Eric Muller.
stage 2: entered in the index, OHCHR identified as the source.
